verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O Christ, He is the fountain
The deep sweet well of love!
The streams on earth I've tasted
More deep I'll drink above:
There to an ocean fullness His mercy doth expand,
And glory, glory dwelleth
In Emmanuel's land.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The bride eyes not her garment,
But her dear Bridegroom's face;
I will not gaze at glory
But on my King of grace
Not at the crown He giveth
But on His pierced hand;
The Lamb is all the glory
Of Emmanuel's land.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
O I am my Beloved's
And my Beloved's mine!
He brings a poor vile sinner
Into His house of wine
I stand upon His merit -
I know no other stand,
Not e'en where glory dwelleth
In Emmanuel's land.

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Deep waters cross'd life's pathway
A hedge of thorns has torn
With mercy and with judgement
His plan for me I've born
I'll bless His hand upon me
I'll bless the heart that plann'd,
I'll trust, He's never failed me
In Immanuel's land.

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
I've borne the scorn and hatred
I've borne the wrong shame,
Earth's proud ones have reproached me,
For Christ's thrice blessed name;
Where God His seal set fairest
They've stamp'd their foulest brand;
But judgement shines like noonday
In Immanuel's land.
